name: mraverageheader
description:
Calculate the average (unbiased) coordinate space of all input images.



References:
author: MRTrix3 Developers

inputs.name: padding
inputs.description: boundary box padding in voxels. Default: 0

inputs.name: resolution
inputs.description: subsampling of template compared to smallest voxel size in any input image. Valid options are 'mean': unbiased but loss of resolution for individual images possible, and 'max': smallest voxel size of any input image defines the resolution. Default: mean

inputs.name: fill
inputs.description: set the intensity in the first volume of the average space to 1

inputs.name: datatype
inputs.description: specify output image data type. Valid choices are: float32, float32le, float32be, float64, float64le, float64be, int64, uint64, int64le, uint64le, int64be, uint64be, int32, uint32, int32le, uint32le, int32be, uint32be, int16, uint16, int16le, uint16le, int16be, uint16be, cfloat32, cfloat32le, cfloat32be, cfloat64, cfloat64le, cfloat64be, int8, uint8, bit.

inputs.name: quiet
inputs.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

inputs.name: force
inputs.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

inputs.name: nthreads
inputs.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

inputs.name: config
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

type.name: config
type.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: key
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: help
inputs.description: display this information page and exit.
